005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractLoader;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IConstraintLoader;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IDefinition;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFieldDefinition;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IFlagDefinition;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AbstractTargetedConstraints;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyConstraintSet;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IFeatureModelConstrained;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IModelConstrained;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ISource;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ITargetedConstraints;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.ConstraintXmlSupport;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.MetaschemaMetaConstraintsDocument;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.MetaschemaMetapathReferenceType;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.ModelContextType;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
029
030import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
031import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
032
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.net.URI;
035import java.util.Collection;
036import java.util.Deque;
037import java.util.LinkedList;
038import java.util.List;
039import java.util.stream.Collectors;
040import java.util.stream.Stream;
041
042import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
043import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
044
045@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
046public class XmlMetaConstraintLoader
047    extends AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
048    implements IConstraintLoader {
049
050  @Override
051  protected List<IConstraintSet> parseResource(URI resource, Deque<URI> visitedResources) throws IOException {
052
053    // parse this metaschema
054    MetaschemaMetaConstraintsDocument xmlObject = parseConstraintSet(resource);
055
056    MetaschemaMetaConstraintsDocument.MetaschemaMetaConstraints constraints = xmlObject.getMetaschemaMetaConstraints();
057
058    StaticContext.Builder builder = StaticContext.builder()
059        .baseUri(resource);
060
061    constraints.getNamespaceBindingList().stream()
062        .forEach(binding -> builder.namespace(
063            ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getPrefix()), ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getUri())));
064    builder.useWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted(true);
065
066    ISource source = ISource.externalSource(builder.build());
067
068    List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints = ObjectUtils.notNull(constraints.getContextList().stream()
069        .flatMap(context -> parseContext(ObjectUtils.notNull(context), null, source).getTargetedConstraints().stream())
070        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
071    return CollectionUtil.singletonList(new MetaConstraintSet(targetedConstraints));
072  }
073
074  private Context parseContext(
075      @NonNull ModelContextType contextObj,
076      @Nullable Context parent,
077      @NonNull ISource source) {
078
079    List<String> metapaths;
080    if (parent == null) {
081      metapaths = ObjectUtils.notNull(contextObj.getMetapathList().stream()
082          .map(MetaschemaMetapathReferenceType::getTarget)
083          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
084    } else {
085      List<String> parentMetapaths = parent.getMetapaths().stream()
086          .collect(Collectors.toList());
087      metapaths = ObjectUtils.notNull(contextObj.getMetapathList().stream()
088          .map(MetaschemaMetapathReferenceType::getTarget)
089          .flatMap(childPath -> {
090            return parentMetapaths.stream()
091                .map(parentPath -> parentPath + '/' + childPath);
092          })
093          .collect(Collectors.toList()));
094    }
095
096    IModelConstrained constraints = new AssemblyConstraintSet();
097    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, ObjectUtils.notNull(contextObj.getConstraints()), source);
098    Context context = new Context(metapaths, constraints);
099
100    List<Context> childContexts = contextObj.getContextList().stream()
101        .map(childObj -> parseContext(ObjectUtils.notNull(childObj), context, source))
102        .collect(Collectors.toList());
103
104    context.addAll(childContexts);
105
106    return context;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Parse the provided XML resource as a Metaschema constraints.
111   *
112   * @param resource
113   *          the resource to parse
114   * @return the XMLBeans representation of the Metaschema contraints
115   * @throws IOException
116   *           if a parsing error occurred
117   */
118  @NonNull
119  protected MetaschemaMetaConstraintsDocument parseConstraintSet(@NonNull URI resource) throws IOException {
120    try {
121      XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
122      options.setBaseURI(resource);
123      options.setLoadLineNumbers();
124      return ObjectUtils.notNull(MetaschemaMetaConstraintsDocument.Factory.parse(resource.toURL(),
125          options));
126    } catch (XmlException ex) {
127      throw new IOException(ex);
128    }
129  }
130
131  private static class Context {
132    @NonNull
133    private final List<String> metapaths;
134    @NonNull
135    private final IModelConstrained constraints;
136    @NonNull
137    private final List<Context> childContexts = new LinkedList<>();
138
139    public Context(
140        @NonNull List<String> metapaths,
141        @NonNull IModelConstrained constraints) {
142      this.metapaths = metapaths;
143      this.constraints = constraints;
144    }
145
146    public List<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraints() {
147      return Stream.concat(
148          getMetapaths().stream()
149              .map(metapath -> new MetaTargetedContraints(ObjectUtils.notNull(metapath), constraints)),
150          childContexts.stream()
151              .flatMap(child -> child.getTargetedConstraints().stream()))
152          .collect(Collectors.toList());
153    }
154
155    public void addAll(Collection<Context> childContexts) {
156      childContexts.addAll(childContexts);
157    }
158
159    public List<String> getMetapaths() {
160      return metapaths;
161    }
162  }
163
164  private static class MetaTargetedContraints
165      extends AbstractTargetedConstraints<IModelConstrained>
166      implements IFeatureModelConstrained {
167
168    protected MetaTargetedContraints(
169        @NonNull String target,
170        @NonNull IModelConstrained constraints) {
171      super(target, constraints);
172    }
173
174    /**
175     * Apply the constraints to the provided {@code definition}.
176     * <p>
177     * This will be called when a definition is found that matches the target
178     * expression.
179     *
180     * @param definition
181     *          the definition to apply the constraints to.
182     */
183    protected void applyTo(@NonNull IDefinition definition) {
184      getAllowedValuesConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
185      getMatchesConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
186      getIndexHasKeyConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
187      getExpectConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
188    }
189
190    protected void applyTo(@NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
191      applyTo((IDefinition) definition);
192      getIndexConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
193      getUniqueConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
194      getHasCardinalityConstraints().forEach(definition::addConstraint);
195    }
196
197    @Override
198    public void target(IFlagDefinition definition) {
199      applyTo(definition);
200    }
201
202    @Override
203    public void target(IFieldDefinition definition) {
204      applyTo(definition);
205    }
206
207    @Override
208    public void target(IAssemblyDefinition definition) {
209      applyTo(definition);
210    }
211  }
212
213  private static final class MetaConstraintSet implements IConstraintSet {
214    @NonNull
215    private final List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints;
216
217    private MetaConstraintSet(@NonNull List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints) {
218      this.targetedConstraints = targetedConstraints;
219    }
220
221    @Override
222    public Iterable<ITargetedConstraints> getTargetedConstraintsForModule(IModule module) {
223      return targetedConstraints;
224    }
225
226    @Override
227    public Collection<IConstraintSet> getImportedConstraintSets() {
228      return CollectionUtil.emptyList();
229    }
230
231  }
232}
